contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Beuvron-en-Auge}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Beuvron-en-Auge |image = Beuvron-en-Auge plein.JPG |image coat of arms = Blason_Lillebonne.svg |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Lisieux |canton = Cambremer |INSEE = 14070 |postal code = 14430 |mayor = Michel Caffard |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Cambremer |longitude = -0.0444 |latitude = 49.1894 |elevation m = 10 |elevation min m = 3 |elevation max m = 143 |area km2 = 9.68 |population = 222 |population date = 2008 }} '''Beuvron-en-Auge''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. Beuvron-en-Auge was given the label of [[Les Plus Beaux Villages de France]] (The most beautiful villages of France), decreed by an independent association aiming at promoting to the tourist as sets of small and picturesque French communes of quality heritage. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1962|379 |1968|338 |1975|313 |1982|276 |1990|274 |1999|233 |2008|222 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] [[File:Normandie Calvados Beuvron2 tango7174.jpg|thumb|left|upright=1.5|Village centre]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{Commons category|Beuvron-en-Auge}} {{Calvados communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Beuvronenauge}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] [[Category:Plus Beaux Villages de France]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
